projects.title: Bug Tracker
projects.desc: A Full Stack Software to efficiently track and manage software bugs, enhancing the communication and collaboration between developers, testers, and other stakeholders in the software development process.

projects.title: CoLabo
projects.desc: Comprehensive virtual research assistant which aims to help students and researchers to streamline and organise their research for efficient results

projects.title: Interview Bridge
projects.desc: Interview Bridge is a web platform that allows users to conduct technical interviews with audio, video, real-time chat, and a real-time code editor.

projects.title: AI chatbot
projects.desc: This chatbot respond to user inquiries and requests in a conversational manner and it's User-friendly and intuitive interface allows for easy communication.

projects.title: Math Game
projects.desc: A Math Game for children to improve their basic math operational skills. Random numbers will be generated for the game. Upon giving a correct answer, the scoreboard increases. If a wrong answer is given, the game will end.

exp.name: Juniper
exp.des: Developing a full-stack device monitoring application for real-time network management and device tracking, featuring a GUI SSH terminal, real-time alerts, and robust user authentication; also conducting R&D on Open Source Large Language Models for a specific need.

exp.name: intel
exp.des: At my Intel Unnati Summer Internship, I implemented a hybrid architecture model using Deep Neural Networks (DNN) and XGBoost for smartphone price prediction, which improved the prediction accuracy significantly.

exp.name: 1d
exp.des: Collaborated with a team of data scientists to design and implement a machine learning model that enhanced the accuracy of demand forecasting for a large retail company by 20%.

exp.name: hire
exp.des: I am team-oriented, hardworking individual willing to give my 100% for the organization and grow together with the organization. If you think I am a right fit for your organization I will be very happy to work in the organization.

blog.title: I am a full-stack web developer and data analyst with also interest in AI, skilled in crafting innovative and scalable web applications. My educational background includes a Bachelor of Engineering degree in Information Technology from the Manipal Institute of Technology (Class of 2024), I am adept at leveraging technology to solve real-world problems. My project portfolio showcases my commitment to using technology for problem-solving.
